value.title: StarCraft 2: FIGHTING FIRE WITH FIRE! (Cure vs Solar)
value.excerpt: Fun best-of-3 series between Solar and Cure at the professional level of StarCraft 2. In this series we see Terran cheese, Terran Mech and Terran Bio out of the Terran player.
